amendment.description: To authorize Department of Veterans Affairs to continue major medical facility projects and leases which have funds previously appropriated.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5135 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5135 proposed by Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S10902; text: CR S10902) To authorize Department of Veterans Affairs to continue major medical facility projects and leases which have funds previously appropriated.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5135 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5135 proposed by Senator Hutchison.
